xlib_symbol.description: xMenu1A Object Prototype. A variation on xMenu1. The menu slides down and up.

par.name: mouseMargin
par.note: integer margin around menu; when mouse is outside this margin the menu is hid.

par.name: slideTime
par.note: integer time for menu slide (in milliseconds)

par.name: openEvent
par.note: string name of event on which to open menu ('click', 'mouseover', etc)

demo.note: simple menus with plenty of potential
